privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.introduction: Lingosource Ltd, incorporated in the UK (Company Number 16688081), trading as 'Lingosource', provides outsourced call centre solutions including customer support, sales assistance, and administrative tasks. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your personal and non-personal information when you use our Services.
privacyPolicy.agreementNotice: By using our Services, you agree to this Privacy Policy. If you do not agree, you should stop using our Services.
privacyPolicy.compliance: This Privacy Policy complies with UK Data Protection Act 2018, UK GDPR, PECR, and, where applicable, EU GDPR.

subsections.title: 1.1 Information You Provide Directly
content: Online forms, demos, billing, and payments
Personal details such as name, address, email, phone, billing info, and business details

subsections.title: 1.2 Information Collected Automatically
content: Usage data: pages visited, actions, date/time

howWeUse.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
content: Provide and manage Services (account setup, call handling, support)
Send service updates and optional marketing

sharingInfo.title: 3. How We Share Your Information
content: With service providers (payments, hosting, CRM, analytics)

rights.title: 5. Your Privacy Rights
content: Access, correct, or delete your data
UK/EU rights: data portability, restrict processing, object to use, complain to Data Protection Authority

children.title: 6. Children's Privacy
content: Services not directed to children under 18
Immediate deletion if data collected without consent

cookies.title: 8. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
content: Performance cookies: analytics and site improvement
Marketing cookies: targeted ads and offers
Cookie controls: browser settings, opt-out tools, consent banner

retention.title: 10. Data Retention
content: Data kept only as long as necessary

transfers.title: 11. International Data Transfers
content: Data may be transferred outside UK/EEA (e.g., US via Stripe/PayPal)

marketing.title: 12. Marketing Communications & Opt-Out
content: Opt-out via unsubscribe link or contacting us
Service-related emails still sent even if marketing is declined

changes.title: 13. Changes to Privacy Policy
content: Continued use = acceptance of new policy

contact.title: 14. Complaints and Contact Information
content: Complaints: ICO or local Data Protection Authority

introduction.title: Introduction
content: These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your use of the phone answering services provided by Lingosource Ltd, a company incorporated under the Companies Act 2006 of the United Kingdom, bearing Company Number 16688081 and having its registered office at 71-75 Shelton Street, Covent Garden, London, England ("Company", "we", "us", or "our"), operating under the trading name "Lingosource" ("Service").

Lingosource provides professional phone answering and call redirection services where trained agents answer incoming calls on behalf of businesses when they are unavailable or too busy. Our agents take messages, provide basic information, and handle customer communications professionally.

By signing up for, accessing, or using our Service, you ("Client", "you", or "your") agree to be bound by these Terms. In the event you do not agree to these Terms, you are advised to refrain from using our Service.

subsections.title: Phone Answering Services
subsections.description: Lingosource is a professional phone answering service that charges businesses on a per-minute basis to handle their incoming calls when they are unavailable or too busy. Our comprehensive service includes:

list.title: Professional Call Answering:
list.text: Trained agents answer your business calls using your company name and customized greeting

list.title: Call Redirection and Routing:
list.text: Intelligent call forwarding based on your specific instructions and business needs

list.title: Message Taking Services:
list.text: Detailed message capture with accurate caller information, inquiry details, and urgency levels

list.title: Call Screening and Filtering:
list.text: Professional screening to identify important calls, filter spam, and handle routine inquiries

list.title: Appointment Scheduling:
list.text: Basic appointment booking and calendar management where instructed

list.title: Order Taking:
list.text: Simple order processing and information collection for your business

list.title: Customer Service Representation:
list.text: First-line customer support representing your business professionally

list.title: Emergency Call Handling:
list.text: Priority routing for urgent calls according to your escalation procedures

list.title: Multilingual Support:
list.text: Where available, support in multiple languages for diverse customer bases

list.title: After-Hours Coverage:
list.text: Professional representation outside your normal business hours

list.title: a) Customized Scripts:
list.text: Tailored call handling scripts developed specifically for your business

list.title: b) Brand Representation:
list.text: Agents trained to represent your company's values, tone, and service standards

list.title: c) Call Disposition:
list.text: Proper categorization and handling of different call types (sales, support, complaints, etc.)

list.title: d) Warm Transfer Capabilities:
list.text: Live transfer of important calls to designated team members

list.title: e) Hold and Callback Management:
list.text: Professional handling of busy periods with callback scheduling

list.title: Detailed Message Taking:
list.text: Comprehensive capture of caller information, including name, contact details, purpose of call, and any specific requirements

list.title: Real-time Message Delivery:
list.text: Immediate notification of urgent messages via your preferred communication channel

list.title: Message Prioritization:
list.text: Classification of messages by urgency level and business importance

list.title: Follow-up Tracking:
list.text: Basic tracking of message delivery and client response requirements

list.title: Secure Information Handling:
list.text: Confidential treatment of all business and customer information

list.title: Multi-Channel Message Delivery:
list.text: Messages sent via email, SMS, secure client portal, or phone as per your preferences

list.title: Call Summary Reports:
list.text: Regular reporting on call volumes, types, and handling statistics

list.title: Performance Analytics:
list.text: Basic analytics on call patterns, peak times, and service efficiency

list.title: Custom Reporting:
list.text: Tailored reports based on your specific business needs and KPIs

list.title: CRM Integration:
list.text: Where possible, integration with your existing customer relationship management systems

list.title: Call Recording:
list.text: Professional-grade call recording for quality assurance and training purposes

list.title: Cloud-Based Platform:
list.text: Secure, reliable cloud infrastructure ensuring service continuity

list.title: Mobile Compatibility:
list.text: Service management accessible via mobile devices and tablets

subsections.title: Service Delivery Model
subsections.description: Our service operates on a per-minute charging basis, meaning you only pay for the actual talk time our agents spend handling your calls. This model provides:

list.title: Cost Efficiency:
list.text: No fixed monthly fees, pay only for services used

list.title: Scalability:
list.text: Service scales automatically with your business growth or seasonal fluctuations

list.title: Flexibility:
list.text: No long-term commitments, adjust usage based on your needs

list.title: Transparency:
list.text: Clear, itemized billing showing exactly what services were provided

list.title: Operating Hours:
list.text: Service available 24/7/365 or customized to your specific business hours

list.title: Geographic Coverage:
list.text: UK-wide service with international call handling capabilities

list.title: Backup Systems:
list.text: Redundant systems ensuring minimal service interruptions

list.title: Disaster Recovery:
list.text: Comprehensive business continuity planning for uninterrupted service

subsections.title: Service Limitations and Exclusions
subsections.description: While we strive to provide comprehensive call handling services, certain limitations apply:

categories.title: Professional Advice Limitations
list: We provide call answering and message-taking services only
Agents cannot provide legal, medical, financial, or specialized professional advice
Complex technical support requiring specialized knowledge may need additional arrangements
Agents cannot make binding business decisions or commitments on your behalf

categories.title: Service Scope Limitations
list: Services limited to telephone-based communications (unless specifically arranged)
Cannot provide on-site services or physical presence requirements
Limited to information provided in your service instructions and training materials
Cannot access your internal systems without specific integration arrangements

categories.title: Regulatory and Compliance Limitations
list: Cannot handle calls requiring specific professional licensing (medical, legal, financial advice)
Compliance with industry-specific regulations is your responsibility
Cannot guarantee compliance with specialized industry standards without specific arrangements

subsections.title: Account Registration
subsections.description: To use our Service, you must:
list: Complete our online registration form
Provide accurate business and contact information
Participate in a service demo or setup call as arranged
Be at least 18 years of age or have parental/guardian consent
Represent a legitimate business operation

subsections.title: Account Information
list: Provide complete and accurate registration information
Maintain the accuracy of your account information
Notify us promptly of any changes to your business details or contact information
Keep your account credentials secure and confidential

subsections.title: Account Verification
list: Verify your business information and identity
Request additional documentation to confirm your business legitimacy
Decline service to businesses that do not meet our requirements

list.title: Call Handling Rate:
list.text: $1 USD per minute

list.title: Billing Model:
list.text: Post-paid monthly billing based on actual usage

list.title: Currency:
list.text: Invoices issued in both USD and GBP

subsections.title: Payment Methods
list: Credit/debit cards through Stripe (primary method)
PayPal
Bank transfers (upon arrangement)

list.title: Post-Paid Billing:
list.text: You are charged monthly for services used in the previous month

list.title: Automatic Charging:
list.text: Your registered payment method is automatically charged on the monthly billing date

list.title: Invoice Delivery:
list.text: Monthly invoices sent via email to your registered email address

subsections.title: Payment Processing
list: Payment processing is handled securely by certified third-party processors
We do not store complete credit card numbers on our servers
All transactions are encrypted and PCI-DSS compliant

list.title: Payment Default:
list.text: Non-payment for 10 days after the due date may result in service suspension

list.title: No Interest/Penalties:
list.text: We do not charge interest or late payment penalties

list.title: Resolution Attempts:
list.text: We will attempt to contact you to resolve payment issues before suspension

list.title: Service Restoration:
list.text: Service resumed immediately upon successful payment

list.title: Post-Paid Nature:
list.text: As services are billed after use, no refunds or credits are provided

list.title: Service Interruptions:
list.text: No refunds for service interruptions beyond our control

list.title: Dispute Resolution:
list.text: Payment disputes handled through formal dispute resolution process

subsections.title: Acceptable Use
subsections.description: Our Service may be used for:
list: Legitimate business communications and customer service
Professional call handling and message taking
Inbound call management and routing
Customer inquiry handling and appointment scheduling

subsections.title: Prohibited Industries and Activities
subsections.description: We do not provide services to businesses primarily engaged in:
list: Adult entertainment or adult content services
Gambling or betting operations
Escort services
Tobacco products or related services
Alcohol sales or distribution
Cannabis or marijuana-related businesses
Weapons, firearms, or ammunition sales
Unregulated financial services or cryptocurrency trading platforms

subsections.title: Prohibited Uses
subsections.description: You may not use our Service for:
list: Fraudulent, abusive, or unlawful activities
Harassment, spam, or unsolicited marketing calls
Any activity that violates UK telecommunications regulations
Impersonation or misrepresentation of identity or business purpose
Activities that could damage our reputation or violate our policies

list.title: Arrangement Required:
list.text: Outbound calling services available only by special arrangement

list.title: Compliance:
list.text: All outbound activities must comply with UK telecommunications regulations

list.title: Additional Terms:
list.text: Separate terms and pricing may apply for outbound services

subsections.title: Privacy Policy
subsections.content: Your privacy is important to us. Our collection, use, and protection of your personal information is governed by our Privacy Policy, which is incorporated into these Terms by reference.

list.title: Quality Assurance:
list.text: Calls may be recorded for quality assurance and training purposes

list.title: Retention Period:
list.text: Call recordings retained for one (1) year from the date of the call

list.title: Data Security:
list.text: All recordings stored securely and handled in compliance with UK data protection laws

subsections.title: Caller Information
list: We may collect caller information (name, phone number, message content) on your behalf
Such information is processed as your Data Processor under UK GDPR
You remain responsible as Data Controller for ensuring lawful basis for data collection

list.title: Our Materials:
list.text: We own all call scripts, training materials, and operational procedures

list.title: Call Recordings:
list.text: We own call recordings and may use them for quality assurance and training

list.title: Client Materials:
list.text: You retain ownership of your business information and branding provided to us

list.title: Client Grant:
list.text: You grant us a limited license to use your business name, basic information, and instructions to provide our services

list.title: Anonymized Data:
list.text: We may use anonymized call data for training and service improvement purposes

subsections.title: No Copying Restriction
subsections.content: We do not restrict clients from copying website content or our branding for legitimate business purposes.

subsections.title: Service Availability
list: We strive to provide reliable service but cannot guarantee 100% uptime
Service availability subject to maintenance, technical issues, and third-party dependencies
Planned maintenance will be communicated in advance where possible

list.title: Contact Methods:
list.text: Email (contact@lingosource.uk), phone, and online contact form

list.title: Support Hours:
list.text: Monday to Friday, 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM GMT

list.title: Response Time:
list.text: We aim to respond to support inquiries within 24 hours during business days

subsections.title: Service Modifications
list: We reserve the right to modify, update, or discontinue features of our Service
Material changes will be communicated with reasonable advance notice
Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance of modifications

subsections.title: Limitation Amount
subsections.content: Our total liability for any claims arising from or related to our Service is limited to the amount you paid us in the six (6) months immediately preceding the claim.

subsections.title: Excluded Damages
list: Consequential, indirect, incidental, or punitive damages
Lost profits, business opportunities, or revenue
Data loss or corruption not directly caused by our negligence
Third-party actions or failures beyond our reasonable control

subsections.title: Force Majeure
subsections.description: We are not liable for service interruptions caused by:
list: Natural disasters, war, or government actions
Internet or telecommunications infrastructure failures
Third-party service provider failures
Other circumstances beyond our reasonable control

subsections.title: Professional Advice Disclaimer
list: Our agents provide call answering services only, not professional advice
We are not responsible for business decisions made based on our message-taking services
Clients should seek appropriate professional advice for business, legal, or technical matters

sections.title: Indemnification
sections.description: You agree to indemnify, defend, and hold harmless Lingosource Ltd, its officers, directors, employees, and agents from and against any claims, damages, losses, costs, or expenses (including reasonable attorneys' fees) arising from:
list: Your use of our Service in violation of these Terms
Your violation of any applicable laws or regulations
Information or content you provide to us or our agents
Third-party claims related to your business operations

subsections.title: Term
subsections.content: These Terms remain in effect while you use our Service or maintain an account with us.

subsections.title: Termination by You
subsections.description: You may terminate your account at any time by:
list: Providing written notice to contact@lingosource.uk
Following account closure procedures in your client dashboard
Calling our customer support during business hours

subsections.title: Termination by Us
subsections.description: We may terminate or suspend your account immediately if:
list: You violate these Terms or our Acceptable Use Policy
Payment is overdue by more than 10 days despite our attempts to contact you
We reasonably believe continued service would be unlawful or harmful
Your business operates in a prohibited industry

subsections.title: Effect of Termination
list: Your right to use the Service immediately ceases
Outstanding charges become immediately due and payable
We will retain records as required by law or for legitimate business purposes
Data deletion will follow our Privacy Policy retention schedules

subsections.title: Client References
list: Use your business name and logo as a reference on our website and marketing materials
Include your business in case studies or testimonials
Reference our business relationship in proposals to prospective clients

subsections.title: Brand Usage Consent
subsections.content: If you wish to use our brand or logo publicly, you must obtain our prior written consent.

subsections.title: Marketing Communications
subsections.content: We may send you promotional communications about our services. You can opt out at any time by following the unsubscribe instructions in our emails or contacting us directly.

subsections.title: Governing Law
subsections.content: These Terms are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of England and Wales.

subsections.title: Dispute Resolution Process
subsections.description: For disputes arising from these Terms:

list.title: Direct Resolution:
list.text: Contact us first at contact@lingosource.uk to attempt informal resolution

list.title: Mediation:
list.text: The parties may first attempt mediation through a recognised UK mediation service before commencing court proceedings, if both agree in writing.

list.title: Court Jurisdiction:
list.text: Any legal proceedings shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of England and Wales

subsections.title: Limitation Period
subsections.content: Any claims must be brought within six (6) years from the date the cause of action arose, or within the applicable statutory limitation period, whichever is shorter.

subsections.title: Entire Agreement
subsections.content: These Terms, together with our Privacy Policy, constitute the entire agreement between you and Lingosource Ltd regarding the Service.

subsections.title: Modifications
subsections.content: We may modify these Terms from time to time. Material changes will be communicated via email or prominent notice on our website. Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance of the revised Terms.

subsections.title: Severability
subsections.content: If any provision of these Terms is found to be unenforceable, the remaining provisions will remain in full force and effect.

subsections.title: Assignment
subsections.content: You may not assign or transfer your rights under these Terms without our written consent. We may assign our rights and obligations under these Terms in connection with a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets.

subsections.title: Waiver
subsections.content: Our failure to enforce any provision of these Terms does not constitute a waiver of that provision or any other provision.

subsections.title: Survival
subsections.content: Provisions that by their nature should survive termination (including payment obligations, intellectual property, limitation of liability, and dispute resolution) will survive termination of these Terms.

sections.title: Contact Information

list.title: Company:
list.text: Lingosource Ltd

list.title: Trading Name:
list.text: Lingosource (The Phone answering service will have a designated website in the future which will be Horizonanswering.com)

list.title: Registered Address:
list.text: 71-75 Shelton Street, Covent Garden, London, England

list.title: Email:
list.text: contact@lingosource.uk

list.title: Business Hours:
list.text: Monday to Friday, 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM GMT

sections.closing: For questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us using the information above.
